remarks: A subgroup of finite index is closed iff it is open.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
subgntr.h $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
cldsubg.1 $e |- R = ( G ~QG S ) $.
cldsubg.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cldsubg $p |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ ( X /. R ) e. Fin ) -> ( S e. ( Clsd ` J ) <-> S e. J ) ) $.
